description.hltext_display: Lakers Coach Says Humbug To Christmas Games
description.content:
LOS ANGELES -- Phil Jackson says humbug to the NBA's Christmas schedule.
The 11-time NBA champion coach restated his longtime opposition to Christmas games Tuesday night before his Los Angeles Lakers faced the Milwaukee Bucks in their final tuneup before Saturday's visit from the Miami Heat.
"It's like Christian holidays don't mean to them anything any more," Jackson said. "Just go out and play and entertain the TV. It's really weird, but it is what it is. We have to go to work and make the best of it."
Jackson is the son of two Christian ministers, and he famously wrote a book on his spiritual growth related to basketball.
The Lakers have played on every Christmas since 1999, including three straight games against the Heat during Shaquille O'Neal's tenure after his trade from Los Angeles. Kobe Bryant has played on Christmas in 13 of his 15 NBA seasons - not including the 1998-99 season, which didn't begin until the new year due to the lockout.
Jackson hates the Lakers' annual spot in the showcase, noting the NHL and most other major sports usually take Christmas off.
"I don't think anybody should play on Christmas Day," Jackson said. "I don't understand it."
The coach doesn't sound interested in voicing those concerns in person to commissioner David Stern, however.
"He'll see it," Jackson said with a grin.
Jackson also objects to the proliferating number of Christmas games in recent seasons, after many years with a single or two holiday games. The NBA has scheduled five for Saturday, with Bryant's showdown against LeBron James and the revamped Heat at center stage.
Jackson said the timing of the game - and the 2 p.m. local start time, 5 hours earlier than the Lakers' usual tip-off - will reduce its importance.
"It's going to be Christmas, and you're going to have little kids putting batteries in toys and putting their Christmas presents together," Jackson said. "There's all kinds of crazy stuff going on, and now your head has got to get focused on the game, in the middle of the afternoon on Christmas Day."
Jackson believes the Lakers got overly amped about last season's Christmas meeting with the Cleveland Cavaliers, leading to a painful loss that ended with fans throwing dozens of novelty foam hands onto the court. A year earlier, Los Angeles snapped the Boston Celtics' 19-game winning streak in a rematch of the 2008 NBA finals.
Jackson would prefer to see those historic moments on other calendar dates.
"When I was in the CBA, we had a commissioner who scheduled a Christmas Eve game. I had to call him up and say, 'That's the holy time,'" Jackson said. "You just have to keep reminding them that this is a special day."

description.hltext_display: APPOINTMENT OF DENIS TURCOTTE AS CANADIAN BASED DIRECTOR
description.author: info@tradingmarkets.com
description.content:
Coalspur Mines Limited ("Coalspur" or "Company") (ASX: CPL, TSX: CPT | PowerRating
Mr. Turcotte is a Professional Engineer with over 25 years experience and was previously the President and CEO of Algoma Steel Inc. ("Algoma") an integrated steel producer based in Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario. Mr Turcotte oversaw the successful recapitalisation and rapid growth of Algoma which was subsequently acquired for C$1.85 billion in cash by Essar Global Limited ("Essar") in 2007. Mr. Turcotte is currently President and CEO of a private business consulting and investing firm. He is also a director of Domtar Corp. and a member of the Advisory Board of the Brookfield Special Situations Funds.
Mr. Turcotte is highly regarded by the North American investment community and brings to the Board his extensive experience as a senior executive of TSX listed and commodity based companies. Mr. Turcotte will immediately join the Company's Audit Committee.
The Board is delighted to welcome Mr. Turcotte to the Board and believe that his appointment is an important step for the Company as it strives to develop a major new thermal export coal mine to meet growing energy demands worldwide. Coalspur has recently completed a Pre-Feasibility Study ("PFS") on its Vista Coal Project ("Project") in Alberta, Canada.
Mr. Turcotte will receive an annual retainer of C$40,000 and will be entitled to participate (up to the extent of 100,000 share rights or equivalent) in any future equity incentive plans established by the Company, subject to the necessary regulatory and shareholder approvals. The share rights will not have an exercise price and will be subject to various key project development milestones for the Project.

description.hltext_display: 赔付率稳中有降 快速理赔成电话车险新卖点
description.content:
陈天翔
电话车险渠道的竞争已经渗透到了每一个细节上。《第一财经日报》注意到，为了提高对车主的吸引力，各家财险公司都加大了在服务方面的投入，而理赔速度的快慢竞争更是成为了重中之重。平安产险车意理赔部陈章于日前接受本报记者采访时称，平安产险致力于理赔提速，2010年将“万元以下，三天赔付”的服务承诺提升为“万元以下，一天赔付”，截至11月底，服务承诺达成率高达99.85%。
本报记者在采访中还注意到一个不为外界关注的细节，那就是“电话车险渠道的赔付率较传统渠道高”。多家保险公司的相关业务负责人也给出了比较相似的答案，究其原因就是电话车险渠道的价格要比传统渠道低，如果赔付状况和传统渠道基本差不多的话，分母(保费)变小了，赔付率自然就会偏高。这种说法，也得到了几家财险公司精算部负责人的认同。
陈章在采访中透露，就平安电话车险渠道来看，的确要比传统车险渠道赔付率偏高，“一方面要看费率水平；另一方面还要看业务结构。与传统业务相比，电销渠道投保‘旧车’占比较高，‘全险’占比偏低。价格和结构两个因素共同起作用，导致电话车险赔付率比传统渠道略为偏高。”他表示，“快赔”服务的推出，并没有使赔付情况恶化，通过完善的风险管理，电话车险渠道总体赔付率在可控范围，这一情况在行业里相当具有代表性。
不少推出“快赔”服务的保险公司都认为，“快赔”并不是“瞎赔”、“乱赔”，而是通过保险公司规范内部操作、推广标准化流程、开辟快速通道、考核理赔时效、发挥集中优势，实现理赔服务效率的整体提升，从而最终让保险公司、投保人双方都受益。陈章表示，以平安产险为例，公司对各种渠道赔付的管控要求是一致的，不存在对电话车险保单的理赔专项管控。同时，对于管理完善的公司，“快赔”服务和赔付管控之间并没有什么直接的联系。
有保险公司就曾经对车险理赔的每个环节做过检测，试图弄清楚从出险到最后赔付为什么需要那么长时间。结果发现，原来花时间最多的，恰恰是等待客户的交单环节，也就是说，很多车主在出险之后，并没有及时提交索赔申请，或是因为没有时间，或是觉得金额太小，往往都会拖上一阵子。
事实上，就有包括平安在内的保险公司针对这种情况，推出了上门收单服务等对应的解决办法。陈章表示，“快赔”就是要从“出险报案”到“赔款支付”整个过程中挖掘可提升的环节，将该处理环节的时间进行压缩，而不是将环节该做的事情给省略掉，只要争取加快各个理赔环节，整个过程就很可能节省比较多的时间，从而大大提高理赔的效率，而理赔风险并没有因此而增加。”

description.hltext_display: Enigt om regler för flygtillverkare
description.content:

description.hltext_display: Sharp Develops and Will Introduce LED Controller for Indoor Lighting
description.content:
From the Wires Enables User to Adjust Brightness and Color of LED Ceiling Lights Osaka, Dec 22, 2010 - (JCN Newswire) - Sharp Corporation has developed and will introduce the LR56001 LED controller for LED ceiling lights, allowing users to adjust the brightness and color of three types of LEDs: cool white, warm white, and night light.The demand of long-life, energy-saving LED lighting is growing and its use is expected to expand for indoor lighting fixtures, such as ceiling lights and light bulbs.The LR56001 LED controller can independently control up to three types of LED lights. This allows the user to choose among three types of ceiling lights - cool white, warm white and night light - with each at the desired level of brightness. By adjusting the brightness of cool white and warm white lights the user is able to change the color emitted, anywhere from a warm red color to a cool light blue color. Further, the LR56001 has a built-in chopper circuit(1), which prevents power loss even when the forward voltage(2) of the three types of LED differs.With this entry into the market for LED controllers for indoor lighting, Sharp will bring improved convenience and energy efficiency to LED lighting.Product name LED controller for indoor lighting Model name LR56001 Sample price 450 yen Sample availability date December 22, 2010 Mass production date January 31, 2011 Monthly production 100,000 units Major Features1. A three-channel independent control allows brightness and color adjustments to be made for three types of LED ceiling lights (cool white, warm white, and night lights). 2. Built-in chopper circuit contributes to greater energy efficiency for LED lights. Specifications Product name LED controller for indoor lighting Model name LR56001 Output channels 3 Operating voltage Core: 5.0 V +/- 0.5 I/O: 3.3 V +/- 0.3 / 5.0 V +/- 0.5 Consumption current TYP. 12 mA Operating temperature -40 C to 85 C (1) A control method that arbitrarily creates effective values of current and voltage by repeatedly turning on and off the current and voltage. (2) The voltage drop that occurs when electricity flows in the forward direction (from the anode to the cathode) of a diode such as in an LED.About SharpSharp Corporation (TSE: 6753) is a worldwide developer of innovative products and core technologies that play a key role in shaping the future of electronics. As a leader in liquid crystal displays (LCDs) and digital technologies, Sharp offers one of the broadest and most advanced lines of consumer electronics, information products and electronic components, while also creating new network businesses. For more information, please visit www.sharp.co.jp .Source: SharpContact:
Corporate Public Relations Division Sharp Corporation Phone: +81-6-6625-3006 (Osaka) Phone: +81-3-3260-1870 (Tokyo)

description.hltext_display: Dutzende Päckchen zur Weihnacht
description.content:
St. Magnus. Es gehört schon lange zur guten, alten Tradition Seit mehr als 35 Jahren unterstützt der Lions-Club Bremen-Unterweser das Jugendgemeinschaftswerk. Seitdem 1983 nicht nur Tages-, sondern auch feste Bewohner an der Richthofenstraße untergebracht sind, gibt es auch jedes Jahr extra Weihnachtsgeschenke. Vor zwei Tagen war es wieder soweit. Der Weihnachtsmann auf dem größeren, roten Sackleinen, die glitzernden "Merry Christmas"-Buchstaben auf der großen Weihnachtstüte, die mit Tannenzweigen und Geschenkpapier umhüllten Päckchen - gleich eine ganze Abordnung des Lions-Club Bremen-Unterweser traf am Montagvormittag im Gemeinschaftsraum des "Haus Richardson" des Jugendgemeinschaftswerkes ein.
Da warteten neben Geschäftsführer Jens Hartmann und einigen Betreuern besonders die Bewohner voller Vorfreude. Die Aufregung war groß, während Dutzende von liebevoll, festlich verpackten Päckchen ihren Weg in den Gemeinschaftsraum fanden. Insgesamt 25 Bewohner in allen drei Häusern sollen nämlich laut Lions-Club-Mitgliedern dieses Jahr erneut mit einer Extraüberraschung beglückt werden.
Als Weihnachtsmänner beziehungsweise -frau betätigten sich da Margarete und Heinz Buchholz sowie Frank Theilen. Die Abordnung von Bewohnern, die sich schon im Gemeinschaftsraum eingefunden hatte positionierte sich - passend zur Jahreszeit - unter dem Tannenbaum in der Eingangshalle und nahm - stellvertretend für alle - die Geschenke entgegen.

description.hltext_display: Economy hit for £1.5bn in the big freeze
description.content:
The economy has suffered a £1.5billion 'big freeze' shock from travel chaos, lost production and savaged High Street sales.
WANT TO KNOW MORE?
FTSE LATEST
The cost is 50 per cent higher than a normal winter and has prompted a string of cut-price offers from shops desperate to lure back lost Christmas trade.
Yesterday the freezing weather meant tens of thousands of airline passengers remained stranded at major airports, with many huddled in tents outside Heathrow's terminal buildings.
But Heathrow bosses snubbed an offer from transport secretary Philip Hammond to use troops to help clear snow and ice which has crippled a runway since the weekend.
He said the airport's Spanish-owned operator BAA told him they already had the manpower they needed.
But Heathrow did borrow plane de-icer from the military after it ran out of stock.
It also emerged that the airport has slashed its snow defence budget by two-thirds to £500,000, compared with Gatwick's £8m investment.
And the Daily Mail can reveal that earlier this year a senior Heathrow manager, Colin Wood, missed a national aviation meeting to discuss how to avoid winter chaos at airports.
Mick Rix, national officer for the GMB union, said: 'There wasn't enough equipment or manpower at Heathrow - and they ran out of de-icer - so to reject help from the military when so many passengers were stranded is nothing short of scandalous.'
The £1.5bn lost to the economy would buy 9,247,842 grit bins or 75,000 snow ploughs. Heathrow's boss is facing calls to be stripped of his six-figure bonus after David Cameron condemned the chaos.
Colin Matthews, chief executive of BAA, was paid more than £1m this year. But BAA admitted that his bonus would not be affected by the travel disruption.
Meanwhile hundreds of supermarkets and shopping malls will open late today and tomorrow, offering bargains of up to 70% off.
But with a band of snow expected to move through Wales, the Midlands and into southern Britain overnight, many shoppers may again struggle to get out. retail expert Jer-emy Baker, from ESCP Europe Business School, said: 'Shoppers can expect to find a treasure trove of bargains.
Retailers are sitting on a pile of products that will be virtually valueless by the second week in January, so they will have to cut prices to sell them now.' Heathrow's second runway was finally cleared last night, but the number flights leaving will remain far lower than scheduled until at least early tomorrow morning.
Meanwhile, about 200 passengers were evacuated from stricken East Coast Mainline trains following damage to overhead power lines at Huntingdon near Peterborough.
The Government's snow 'troubleshooter' David Quarmby revealed the scale of the cost to the economy and said ministers must decide now whether to make major investment to prevent trouble in future.
• Councils have slashed orders of salt this winter despite the chaos caused by last year's big freeze, a report reveals today.
Local authorities have bought 30,000 fewer tonnes for 2010/11 than in 2009/10 - a reduction in weight equivalent to a cruise liner. And more than a third said they had still not received all of this year's road salt order, the study by the TaxPayers' Alliance said.
It comes as councils were forced to start rationing dwindling supplies after the Arctic blast turned roads into ice rinks.
WANT TO KNOW MORE?
READER COMMENTS

description.hltext_display: Università, cortei a sorpresa per dire no al Ddl Gelmini. Gli studenti a Napolitano: "Non firmi la legge"
description.content: Tornano di nuovo in piazza gli studenti italiani, in tante città, in vista dell'approvazione definitiva al Senato del tanto discusso ddl di riforma dell'università: il clou, come sempre, sarà a Roma, messa a ferro e fuoco lo scorso 14 dicembre dalla contestazione studentesca. Stavolta, però, la protesta dovrebbe assumere dei toni diversi, anche perché gli studenti hanno capito che il ddl verrà approvato, proteste o non proteste: per le strade della capitale non sfilerà infatti il 'solito' corteo, il classico serpentone verso i palazzi delle istituzioni. Anzi, la manifestazione dovrebbe addirittura risparmiare il centro storico e non puntare verso il 'triangolo del potere' Camera-Senato-palazzo Chigi, al quale la scorsa settimana era stato tentato l'assalto da una parte dei manifestanti, con immagini di scontri e devastazioni che hanno fatto il giro del mondo. Niente assalto alla zona rossa, quindi, nonostante "il clima provocatorio avuto dalla Questura in questi giorni", spiegano, tant'è che non è stato neanche avanzata alla Questura richiesta di autorizzazione a sfilare in centro. Lo slogan dei blitz di oggi è 'liberi per la città'. I primi appuntamenti fissati sono a piazzale Aldo Moro e a Piramide, in entrambi i posti alle 9.30. Da lì gli studenti si sposteranno per la città, seguendo un percorso 'top secret': tra le possibili sortite improvvise, quella al Ministero dell'Istruzione in Viale Trastevere. A Milano è già fissato un presidio per le 9 davanti alla Statale, in via Festa del Perdono che, in base al numero di partecipanti e al risultato che uscirà da Palazzo Madama, potrebbe trasformarsi in un corteo o in un punto di partenza per le azioni simboliche di piccoli gruppi di studenti. E oggi verrà consegnata al capo dello Stato una lettera, scritta dai collettivi studenteschi della Sapienza, per chiedergli di non firmare il ddl Gelmini: "Non firmi - dicono gli studenti - sarà così in piazza anche lei al nostro fianco". Gli studenti protesteranno contro l'approvazione definitiva del Ddl Gelmini non solo sfilando per le strade della Capitale, ma anche in quelle di altre città con cortei, presidi e flash mob itineranti. A Torino l'appuntamento è alle 10.30 davanti a palazzo Campana, il primo parlamento dell'Unità d'Italia. A Genova, in piazza San Lorenzo, alle 15, per lo svolgimento di un corteo presidio-itinerante sui temi della crisi economica e sociale che sta interessando le fasce più deboli della popolazione. A Milano è previsto un presidio itinerante che partirà da piazza Duomo in mattinata con lettura collettiva di alcuni articoli fondamentali della Costituzione Italiana: successivamente gli studenti dell'Uds attueranno "altre azioni comunicative in città dal titolo "Siamo tutti inDASPOnibili". A Napoli gli studenti si muoveranno in corteo da piazza del Gesù. Con l'Unione degli Studenti di Napoli ci saranno i collettivi delle scuole e movimento universitario. Ad Avellino l'appuntamento è in piazza D'armi alle 11.15. A Salerno si attuerà un presidio sotto la Provincia, alle 11 assieme agli studenti di Link-Coordinamento Universitario. A Campobasso programmati "flash mob in città sui temi caldi dell'autunno". A Bari è in programma `Tutti sui tetti delle scuole durante la mattinata: un presidio universitario in via Sparano a partire dalle 9 per "animare la protesta con azioni eclatanti che possano mettere al centro dell'agenda politica le nostre proposte". A Foggia flash mob itinerante con partenza dall'università e striscioni calati dalle scuole: presidio presso l'isola pedonale alle 17. A Palermo ritrovo presso il teatro Massimo alle 16. A Catania cortei "spontanei dalle scuole e flash mob anti-Gelmini in giro per la città". A Cosenza gli studenti Uds annunciano il blocco totale della didattica in quasi tutte le scuole della città. E la protesta si allarga anche a scuole del territorio provinciale a Rossano, Corigliano e Castrovillari. Gli studenti hanno fatto sapere che resteranno lontani dai palazzi del potere - Gli universitari hanno inviato una lettera al prefetto, al sindaco e al questore di Roma: "Con la presente gli studenti e le studentesse della Sapienza, a Roma, comunicano alle autorità che il giorno 22 dicembre sfileranno per le strade di Roma - si legge nella lettera -. Apprezziamo davvero la vostra apertura al dialogo che in queste settimane si è manifestata ripetutamente e in vari modi: dalle centinaia di denuncie per manifestazione non autorizzata, agli arresti immotivati, alla costruzione di una "zona rossa" permanente e in continua espansione. Siamo molto lieti di tanta premura nel volerci proteggere, tenendoci lontani dai patetici teatrini e compravendite di parlamentari, che avvengono ormai come consuetudine dentro Montecitorio e Palazzo Madama. Potete stare tranquilli: la politica istituzionale si è già allontanata dai noi e dal resto della società molto tempo fa. Sono proprio i nostri cortei e i nostri blocchi stradali ad aver riportato la politica vera nelle strade e nelle piazze, dall'università a tutta la città". I ragazzi annunciano che si terranno lontano dai palazzi del potere: "Il 22 - continua la lettera - lasceremo i palazzi del potere nella solitudine della loro miseria e andremo nella altre zone della città, per parlare con chi come noi è inascoltato da quelli stessi palazzi. Vogliamo però interloquire con chi ha detto, in questi giorni, che bisogna ascoltare il nostro disagio, perciò domani una nostra delegazione porterà una lettera al Presidente Napolitano". Nella lettera al presidente della Repubblica verrà chiesto di non firmare il contestato ddl. Il piano sicurezza - Anche in Questura c'è il massimo riserbo sul piano sicurezza, del quale in queste ore si stanno preparando gli ultimi particolari. Centinaia di agenti e militari di polizia, carabinieri e guardia di finanza saranno comunque schierati secondo lo schema delle ultime manifestazioni: presidi di camionette e uomini davanti ai palazzi delle istituzioni e agli accessi principali del centro storico, pronti a chiudere a fisarmonica ogni apertura in caso di avvicinamento dei manifestanti. Fino ad allora, varchi aperti e nessun problema per cittadini, lavoratori e turisti di passaggio. Ma le forze dell'ordine saranno istruite e preparate per improvvisi spostamenti verso altre zone della città, a seconda dei movimenti degli studenti e delle iniziative a sorpresa. In ogni caso il clima appare rasserenato, rispetto allo scorso 14 dicembre. E a ciò aiutano anche i numeri: rispetto alla giornata degli scontri, infatti, alla manifestazione di oggi sono attesi molti meno partecipanti. Ieri durissimo scontro procedurale nell'aula del Senato su una norma di legge che il ddl università, nel testo approvato dalla Camera, prima riscrive e poi abroga. Nella concitazione della seduta la presidente di turno (Lega) Rosy Mauro, poco prima di sospendere la seduta, ha dichiarato "approvato", nel corso di una votazione per alzata di mano, ben 4 emendamenti del Partito democratico. La circostanza è riscontrabile nel filmato dei lavori d'aula pubblicato dall'Italia dei Valori. Alla ripresa dei lavori, il presidente del Senato Renato Schifani ha deciso di annullare le votazioni sugli emendamenti al ddl, nelle quali la vicepresidente leghista aveva proclamato approvati quattro emendamenti delle opposizioni. Riprendendo la seduta dell'aula, Schifani ha sostenuto di averlo deciso "su richiesta delle opposizioni, prima ancora che un esponente dell'opposizione mi facesse presente che la vicepresidente Mauro, evidentemente per errore, avesse dato per approvati alcuni emendamenti". Le operazioni di voto vanno quindi ripetute.

description.hltext_display: Dabengwa appointed MTN CEO
description.content:
Sifiso Dabengwa, Chief Executive Officer and Preisdent of MTN Group.
SOUTH Africa’s second largest cellular mobile network, MTN has appointed Zimbabwean engineer, Sifiso Dabengwa as the cellular company’s new Chief Executive Officer and President.
Dabengwa is an Engineering Graduate of the University of Zimbabwe (UZ) and was Chief Operating Officer of MTN Group and CEO of MTN Nigeria before his elevation to the top job.
The Zimbabwean engineering graduate replaces Phuthuma Nhleko who will step down early next year.
Announcing his appointment, MTN said in a statement the position of chief operating officer has been abolished and instead would appoint a new chief executive of its international operations.
Before joining the MTN in 1999, Dabengwa headed Eskom’s distribution division, where he controlled a multibillion-rand budget in a division employing 17 000 people and generating revenues of more than R20bn/year.

description.hltext_display: Apple verwijdert Wikileaks-app uit App Store
description.content:
Nieuwste artikel: Meer over de auteur ; rubriek Nieuws ; 7 keer bekeken; 0 reacties ; Beoordeling: 0 van 5 (0 stemmen)
Apple heeft gisteren een onofficiële Wikileaks-app uit de App Store gehaald. Volgens de fabrikant overtrad de app de regels van de downloadwinkel. Dat schrijft The New York Times.
De 1,99 dollar kostende App werd afgelopen maandag offline gehaald, nadat het drie dagen lang te downloaden was. Volgens een woordvoerder van Apple 'moeten alle apps voldoen aan de lokale wetten en mag het geen schade berokkenen aan groepen of individuen'.
Volgens Igor Barinov, de ontwikkelaar van de app, zou per verkocht exemplaar één dollar gaan naar organisaties die 'opkomen voor de toekomst van online democratie'.
De app kreeg in de korte tijd dat het beschikbaar was drie recensies, waarvan twee negatief. 'Zonde van je geld' en 'geen toegang tot recent gepubliceerde documenten' waren volgens gebruikers reden om het links te laten liggen.
Voor Android zijn nog altijd een paar onofficiële Wikileads-apps verkrijgbaar, zoals Wikileaks Secret Cables en Wikileaks Widget.

description.hltext_display: Currencies: Dollar edges down; euro drops vs. Swiss franc
description.content:
TOKYO (MarketWatch) — The recently embattled euro edged a bit higher against the dollar in Asian trading Wednesday, but slipped to a fresh low against the Swiss franc on continuing fears about Europe’s ongoing sovereign-debt woes.
The euro /quotes/comstock/21o!x:seurusd
Peter Eliades, editor of Stock Market Cycles and manager of Stock Market Cycles Management, explains why he sees the potential for a 25% gain on the S&P 500 during the first half of 2011.
The dollar index /quotes/comstock/11j!i:dxy0
The Australian dollar /quotes/comstock/21o!x:saudusd
Against the Japanese yen, the dollar /quotes/comstock/21o!x:susdjpy
“Our quantitative estimate suggests that USD/JPY [U.S. dollar/Japanese yen] has overshot on the topside and, although we are bullish on USD/JPY over the longer term, there is scope for a correction lower,” said currency strategists at Credit Agricole.
The pound /quotes/comstock/21o!x:sgbpusd
S&P 500 (1 YEAR)
The British pound “has lost ground but its weakness looks temporary. GBP/USD looks cheap around $1.55 and will likely recover ground against both EUR [euro] and USD over the next month,” the Credit Agricole strategists said in a note to clients Wednesday.
Supporting sentiment for the Japanese unit was the trade-data report released by the Ministry of Finance Wednesday. Although export growth in November fell short of forecasts, it still accelerated for the first time in nine months. Lisa Twaronite is MarketWatch's Tokyo bureau chief.

description.hltext_display: Finanzspritze aus dem Sozialressort
description.content:
Bremen-Nord. Ein großes Dankeschön geht vom Haus der Zukunft an Bremens Bürgermeister Jens Böhrnsen und Sozialsenatorin Ingelore Rosenkötter. Der Hintergrund: Das Sozialressort hat nach Worten der Ressortsprecherin Petra Kodré für das Mehrgenerationenhaus einmalig und kurzfristig 40000 Euro zur Verfügung gestellt. Damit kann die Einrichtung ein Jahr ohne Zuschüsse aus dem Topf des Bundesfamilienministeriums überbrücken. Wie berichtet, will das Ministerium ab 2011 die Mittel für Mehrgenerationenhäuser einsparen. Familienministerin Kristina Schröder plant jedoch, ein Anschlussprogramm ab 2013 aufzulegen. In der Zwischenzeit fehlen der Leiterin des Hauses der Zukunft, Heike Binne, fast 50000 Euro. Binne hatte sich im Vorfeld wegen der Bremer Finanzmisere wenig Hoffnung auf Landesmittel gemacht. Sie fand jedoch in Bürgermeister Jens Böhrnsen einen engagierten Fürsprecher.
"Es ist eine tolle Nachricht zu Weihnachten", kommentierte Heike Binne Anfang der Woche die Ankündigung einer Finanzspritze aus dem Ressort von Ingelore Rosenkötter. "Nun sind wir unsere Sorgen los. Wir sagen allen Danke", meinte Heike Binne. Das Geld reiche, um eine halbe Stelle und zahlreiche Angebote für Familien aus Bremen-Nord zu bezahlen, darunter beispielsweise eine Kinderbibliothek und Bewegungsangebote für Senioren.
Das Sozialressort habe die "gut aufgebaute Arbeit" an der Lüssumer Heide nicht ruhen lassen wollen, begründete Sprecherin Petra Kodré den Vorstoß des Sozialressorts. "Vom Bund wäre ja eigentlich zu erwarten, dass eine Anschlussfinanzierung zum Projektende sichergestellt wird. Das ist leider nicht der Fall. Sozialpolitisch wäre es aber nicht zu vertreten, wenn diese Angebote in Bremen Nord wegfallen würde", so Petra Kodré weiter.
Dauerhaft, machte die Ressortsprecherin klar, könne der Betrag für das Mehrgenerationenhaus allerdings nicht aus Rosenkötters Haushalt finanziert werden. Petra Kodré: "Wenn es keine weitere Förderung vom Bund gibt, wird Bremen das nicht kompensieren können."

description.hltext_display: Bensinen dyrare till jul
description.content: Ledande bensinbolag höjde på onsdagen sina riktpriser, sedan världsmarknadspriserna stigit flera dagar i rad. Priset på 95-oktanig bensin höjdes med 10 öre till 13:33 kronor per liter. Dieselpriset höjdes med 8 öre till 12:99 kronor per liter.

description.hltext_display: Kenyan operators combine efforts
description.content:
FOUR mobile operators in Kenya have signed an agreement that will allow subscribers to switch without losing their phone numbers, but they will have to wait until April 1, 2011, for operators to make available the service.
The four mobile-phone operators that included Safaricom, Airtel Kenya, and Eassar have both agreed to implement mobile number.
“Introduction of mobile number portability services is aimed at bolstering the level of competition,” said Charles Njoroge, director general of the Communications Commission of Kenya, told reporters.
But even before it’s implemented, there are emerging reports indicating that three out of the four operators are yet to put their systems in order to allow their subscribers to switch.
Njoroge however said that the postponement had been due to operators not being at the same level in acquiring the requisite equipment and carrying out initial service tests to guarantee the integration of networks.
Already CCK had issued Porting Access Kenya Ltd with a licence for provision of number portability services in Kenya and is expected to start carrying out technical tests in readiness for the service.
Njoroge stressed that it will take a minimum of 48 hours for a user to port and up to 60 days as a cooling period to change to any other operator again.
“The service will bolster the level of competition in the mobile telecommunications market, thus enabling consumers to change networks without suffering the inconvenience of having to change their subscriber
numbers,” Njoroge said.
Airtel Kenya managing director Rene Meza said: “We’re technically ready for MNP and have been collaborating very closely with the CCK to make MNP a reality by December this year. Unfortunately, not all operators are
ready and thus it had to be postponed.”
Earlier in the week, Safaricom chief executive officer Bob Collymore expressed doubts on the viability of the number portability service in Kenya, citing the culture of users buying more than one Sim card to enjoy
the different calling and texting offers by operators.
“This is a multi-SIM country, and almost everyone buys more than one SIM card. Number portability may not work here like in other countries,” said Collymore.
Essar Telkom Kenya’s country manager, Atul Chaturvedi, says the service requires lots of cross operator testing so that when the same number moves from one operator to the other, it can receive all the calls, as earlier, without a hitch.
“This is power discretion in the hands of subscribers. A customer needs not be captive to a particular network just because he or she wants to retain his number,” said Chaturvedi.

description.hltext_display: 银行创新乏力 超级网银尚不超级
description.content:
每经记者 贺麒麟 发自上海
上线已逾百日的央行网上支付跨行清算系统，又称“超级网银”曾被寄予厚望，但事实上，“超级网银”目前看来还非常冷清。
专家指出，“超级网银”冷清现状的背后，是银行间利益不平衡产生的合作不良。不过，也有业内人士表示，各商业银行对“超级网银”不感冒，也从侧面反映了银行的创新乏力。
“超级网银”尚不超级
“超级网银”于今年8月30日在北京、天津、广州、深圳4省(市)先期试运行，在1个多月的测试期后于10月15日正式建成运行。
央行支付结算司司长欧阳卫民在该系统建成运行新闻发布会上曾表示，央行网上支付跨行清算系统，是央行继大额实时支付系统、小额批量支付系统、全国支票影像系统、境内外币支付系统、电子商业汇票系统之后的又一重要跨行支付清算系统。
“新的网上支付跨行清算系统，和以前的大、小额支付系统，是中国现代化支付系统的三大组成部分。”一位银行业资深人士对《每日经济新闻》记者表示。
但这个被热捧为 “超级网银”的新系统，并未获得网银用户的好评。
“开通的时候，几乎跑遍了所有常用银行卡的银行，但是到现在也只用了一两个功能。”一位网银用户表示，现在基本上是一人多卡，但常用的也不过两三张卡，而“超级网银”业务办理手续繁琐、程序复杂，往往让很多用户望而却步。“朋友听我讲了流程以后，都直接放弃了。”
中央财经大学中国银行业研究中心主任郭田勇表示，“超级网银”在功能上有进一步改进的空间。
同时，各行业务收费标准不统一，亦不利于该系统的推广。根据不完全统计显示，大部分银行通过“超级网银”跨行转账的收费水平，与普通网银收费相当；但有少部分股份制银行通过“超级网银”跨行转账的收费却高于普通网银。这也是用户担心的另一大问题。
对此，欧阳卫民日前表示，由于目前央行推出的“超级网银”对商业银行是免费的，随着规模效益的产生，各商业银行网银收费以后也会下降。
银行创新乏力
专家指出，“超级网银”冷清现状的背后，是银行间利益不平衡产生的合作不良。也有业内人士表示，各商业银行对“超级网银”不感冒，从侧面反映了银行的创新乏力。
一业内人士对 《每日经济新闻》表示，无论“超级网银”是否接入第三方支付，由于第三方支付有其相应的应用产品和平台支撑，因此从这个角度看，是第三方支付“活化”了应用平台极少的银行网银。
网购一族日益庞大，有80%的第三方支付用户开通了网银。权威统计数据显示，2010年全国城镇人口中个人网银用户比例为26.9%，第三方支付用户的比例达到19%，其中有近80%开通了网上银行。
“银行和第三方支付之间，更多的是互补关系，两者并不排斥。”欧阳卫民在北京一论坛上公开表示。
上述业内人士称，实际上，从一开始银行就有电子商务的先机，但因银行体系缺乏创新动力，因此如今只能作为资金渠道。
目前，第三方支付市场规模迅速扩容。根据易观国际最新发布的数据预测，受更多传统企业进军电子商务以及网络迅速普及的影响，第三方支付市场规模年底前将轻松突破1万亿元，预测可达到1.0476万亿元。
在此背景下，如果第三方支付顺利接入“超级网银”，对第三方支付企业而言降低了其业务成本，对银行而言则是中间业务收入的增长。
“‘超级网银’将实现单用户跨行资金的统一管理和结算，央行要求所有资金往来都必须经过银行系统，因此有望刺激商业银行中间业务收入的增长。”
此外，随着本月初央行《非金融机构支付服务管理办法实施细则》的发布，第三方支付牌照日渐明晰，据悉首批许可证有望年内派发。

description.hltext_display: Sverige: PPI steg 2,2 % på årsbasis i november - SCB (Forts)
description.content:
(SIX) De svenska producentpriserna (PPI) steg med 0,8
procent i november jämfört med månaden innan. Årstakten
uppmättes till +2,2 procent (+2,3 procent föregående månad).
Marknaden hade enligt SIX Estimates sammanställning räknat
procent). I månadstakt förväntades PPI ha ökat med 0,4
procent.
Importpriserna steg med i genomsnitt 1,0 procent från
oktober till november samtidigt som årstakten uppmättes till
+0,1 procent (+1,2 procent föregående månad).
Exportpriserna var upp med 1,0 procent mellan månaderna
samtidigt som årstakten uppmättes till +0,3 procent (+0,7
procent föregående månad).
Priserna på konsumtionsvaror steg med 0,6 procent mellan
månaderna. Årstakten uppmättes till +0,5 procent (+0,4 procent
föregående månad).
Statistiken presenteras av SCB.
Robert Hultqvist, tel +46 8 586 163 76

description.hltext_display: Sports medical units in Sri Lanka hospitals
description.content:
04:49 am SL Time, ColomboPage News Desk, Sri Lanka.
Dec 22, Polonnaruwa: Sri Lanka's Ministry of Health plans to establish sports medical units in every major hospital in the country, the Health Minister Maithripala Sirisena has said.
At a function to present certificates and cash awards to medal winners of the National Sports Festival representing the North Central Province in Polonnaruwa, Minister Sirisena has said that in the past he had received complaints that there were no separate medical units for sports doctors in government hospitals.
The Minister plans to provide a Sports Medical Unit to every base hospital in the country.
Meanwhile, media reports said that the Sports Minister Mahindananda Aluthgamage has taken measures to begin testing all Sri Lankan athletes, who are participating in international sports, for banned substances.
The only gold medalist from Sri Lanka, boxer Manju Wanniarachchi, 30, at the recent Commonwealth Games held in India found to be positive for the performance enhancing drug nandrolone.
He is likely to face a two-year ban and lose his medal after his second urine sample also tested positive for the banned anabolic steroid.
ColomboPage - Recent 10 Stories

description.hltext_display: Swedish Government Decision On Guarantees To Volvo Cars Wednesday
description.content:
STOCKHOLM -(Dow Jones)- The Swedish government said it will present its decision regarding state guarantees for the European Investment Bank's EUR600 million loan to car maker Volvo PV at 1000 GMT, Wednesday.
Last week the European Union Commission officially approved the terms of the Swedish government's state guarantees to Volvo Cars, the Sweden-based car maker that is owned by China's Geely Automobile Holding Ltd. (0175.HK).
The EIB loans to Volvo are conditional on the Swedish state guaranteeing the entire loan sum in return for collateral provided by Volvo.
The previous negotiations for Volvo Cars' EIB loans were put on hold this spring when Volvo Cars was sold to Chinese automaker Geely. The Swedish government wanted a clearer picture of Volvo Cars' ownership structure before it continued negotiations.
Speaking to Dow Jones Newswires on Nov. 11, Volvo corporate spokesman Per-Ake Froberg said Volvo Cars plans to use the loans for a number of environmental projects that are either ongoing or about to be launched. Copyright � 2010 Dow Jones Newswires

event_or_fact.property: Volvo Cars plans to use the loans for a number of environmental projects that are either ongoing or about to be launched

description.hltext_display: Today, Wednesday, Dec. 22, 2010
description.content:
Photo Courtesy of Historical Society of Palm Beach County
From the archives: In the 1950s, the now-gone Palm Beach Pier, situated off the east end of Worth Avenue, was a hot spot for everyone from families, tourists and late-afternoon Bloody Mary sippers to dolled-up couples canoodling under the moonlight. For decades, the pier was one of the most popular attractions in town and some of Palm Beach County’s most well-known businessmen grew up fishing on it. The pier opened in 1925 under a different name and stretched 1,000-plus feet into the ocean. Then-owner was Gus Jordahn, who owned Gus’ Baths — a saltwater pool complex connected to the beach by an underground passageway — and was the founder of Cowboys of the Sea, a group of men who saved swimmers off the town’s coast. In 1931, Jordahn sold the pier to two local businessmen who renamed it the Palm Beach Pier. Later, a coffee shop, cocktail lounge and a restaurant with a patio for dancing were added. Hurricanes in the 1940s tore off the pier’s end, and two in the 1960s wiped out more. Then came a 1969 storm that caused further damage to the pier, which by that time was in shambles. After that, the town ordered that the pier be demolished — which it was — although its pilings remained for another two decades. — M.M. CLOUTIER

Larger Type Small Type
PICKS OF THE DAY
Sugar Plum fairies: The Nutcracker will be performed at 8 p.m. by the Moscow Classical Ballet in the Kravis Center’s Dreyfoos Hall, 701 Okeechobee Blvd., West Palm Beach. Call 832-7469 or visit kravis.org.
Whitehall Christmas: Holiday evening tours will be conducted at 7:05, 7:15 and 7:25 p.m. at the Flagler Museum, Cocoanut Row and Whitehall Way. Advance tickets requested. Call 655-2833 or visit flaglermuseum.us.
Fashion at a cost: “Feather Wars: Surviving Fashion 1870-1920” is on view from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. at the Richard and Pat Johnson Palm Beach County History Museum, 300 N. Dixie Highway, West Palm Beach. Call 832-4164 or visit historicalsocietypbc.org.
New look at photography: “Stare: The Pleasures of the Intensely Familiar and the Strangely Unexpected” is among the exhibits at the Norton Museum of Art, 1451 S. Olive Ave., West Palm Beach. Hours today: 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. Call 832-5196 or visit norton.org.
Moving comedy: Goldie, Max and Milk, about the joys and trials of single motherhood, will be performed at 1:30 and 7:30 p.m. by Florida Stage at the Kravis Center’s Rinker Playhouse, 701 Okeechobee Blvd., West Palm Beach. Call 585-3433 or visit floridastage.org.
■
THE WEATHER
Today should be mostly sunny with a high temperature near 77 and a low around 58, according to the National Weather Service in Miami. West winds will be between 6 and 10 mph. Tonight, expect northwest wind between 11 and 13 mph.
The marine forecast calls for west-northwest winds of 10-13 knots and seas of 3-5 feet with north-northeast swells of 2 to 3 feet. Intracoastal waters will have a light chop. Tonight, expect west-northwest winds of 13-18 knots and seas of 3-5 feet.
Lake Worth Inlet: High tides will occur at 8:51 a.m. and 8:59 p.m. Low tides will occur at 2:22 a.m. and 2:52 p.m.
Sunrise: 6:46 a.m. Sunset: 5:28 p.m.
■
ROAD WATCH
Flagler Memorial Bridge: One westbound lane will be closed from 9 a.m. to 3:30 p.m. through Dec. 31 for utility system improvements.

description.hltext_display: 'Tatjana moet kiezen'
description.content:
AMSTERDAM - Tatjana Simic moet kiezen tussen een RTL 4-programma waarin zij op zoek gaat naar een potentile partner of de partner die zij al heeft. Dat schrijft De Telegraaf.
Volgens geruchten is Tatjana meer dan goede vrienden met haar buurman Chris van Eeghen. Daarmee zou de zoektocht van de actrice in Wie kiest Tatjana? slechts schijn zijn.
De Telegraaf schrijft woensdag dat RTL er daarom aan denkt de show af te blazen. Tatjana ontkent de geruchten overigens.
Bronnen binnen de zender laten volgens de krant weten dat het tekenen van het contract al twee keer is uitgesteld.
Ook was de op 28 januari gepland staande eerste aflevering tijdelijk geschrapt, maar inmiddels toch weer aangekondigd bij de adverteerders.

description.hltext_display: Aeroproto de Frankfurt começa a voltar à normalidade
description.content:
O Aeroporto de Frankfurt, o maior da Alemanha, voltou a ter todas pistas de aterrragem a funcionar, e espera conseguir escoar os 3500 passageiros retidos nos últimos dias por causa do mau tempo, foi hoje anunciado.
"Tudo indica que a situação se está a desanuviar e os voos em atraso de terça-feira estão quase recuperados", disse um porta voz da Fraport, empresa que gere o aerorporto.
Apesar das melhorias hoje ainda terão de ser anulados cerca de 60 voos dos 1340 voos diários, sobretudo devido aos problemas que ainda subsistem noutros aeroprotos europeus, nomeadamente em Londres.

description.hltext_display: Bauamt: Nächster Sprechtag nur morgens
description.content: Vegesack (ajb). Das Bauamt Bremen-Nord teilt mit, dass beim Sprechtag am morgigen Donnerstag, 23. Dezember, der Nachmittagstermin (15 bis 18 Uhr) ausfällt. Der Vormittagstermin (9 bis 12 Uhr) bleibt bestehen. Weitere Auskünfte unter der Telefonnummer 0421/3617374.

description.hltext_display: Defence inquiry finds export breach (AAP)
description.content:
A sample of Australian Defence Force camouflage fabric was shipped to China without proper approval.
A defence investigation has found approval for export of the fabric sample would have been granted had it been sought.
However, the case has now been referred to the Australian Customs and Border Protection Service for possible further action under Australian export laws.
The defence investigation report was released on Wednesday with key details deleted, including the name of the company responsible.
At issue was whether Australian-developed camouflage fabric specially treated to minimise visibility to night-vision equipment was controlled under Australian defence export regulations.
The inquiry conducted by Colonel Terry McCullagh concluded it was and that a two-metre sample of this fabric had been exported to China without permission in 2008.
But he concluded this was no major breach of security.That's because this technology is widely available. China produces its own comparable fabric for military uniforms and even manufactures combat uniforms for the British army.
In the case of the Australian disruptive pattern camouflage uniform (DPCU) fabric, the key technical details were first published in 1995 with further details released in 2004.
"There is negligible risk that any export of NIR (near infra-red) treated fabric from Australia would contribute to proliferation of military technology," Colonel McCullagh said in the report.
This problem came about as defence moved to tender for supply of combat uniforms over five years in a deal worth some $128 million.
Because of size and complexity and the risk of delay, the Defence Materiel Organisation (DMO) released an interim request for tender for supply of 120,000 combat uniforms over two years at a cost of $13.6 million.
That went to the two last used suppliers of combat uniforms. In December 2009, DMO entered a contract with one firm which included an option for supply of fabric from China in the second year.
It was subsequently alleged the winning company had contravened defence export controls by exporting samples of fabric and the specifications to a Chinese textiles company.
The Australian company subsequently admitted sending the Chinese firm fabric specifications plus a two-metre fabric sample.
It said it did that without knowledge that export controls might be contravened.

event_or_fact.property: There is negligible risk that any export of NIR (near infra-red) treated fabric from Australia would contribute to proliferation of military technology

The NZDCAD has halted its four day advance as price action reversed course at the 20-day moving average. At the same time, the pair has worked its way into a descending channel on the 15 minute chart ahead of New Zealand’s GDP report. As the fundamental developments in the region as of late have been disappointing, traders should not rule out a dismal report. It is also worth noting that today’s economic activity release may pave the way for a longer term short trade as technical studies on the weekly chart point to additional losses. With China poised to raise interest rates in 2011 amid high consumer prices, a selloff of the New Zealand is in the horizon. Furthermore, the kiwi is 34.55 percent overvalued against the loonie when looking at purchasing power parity. As price action moves in our favor, place a trailing stop to avoid any unforeseen losses.

description.hltext_display: Berlusconi avverte la Consulta: "Indecente un no al legittimo impedimento"
description.content: Berlusconi tutto all'attacco, ieri sera a Matrix. Il premier prende di mira la Corte Costituzionale, sostenendo che una bocciatura della legge sul legittimo impedimento sarebbe "indecente", promette che se la Consulta dovesse davvero arrivare a tanto farà "vergognare i pm" , difendendosi "in aula in tv e sui giornali", assicura che, anche in questa ipotesi, continuerà a governare. Poi, striglia Fini, snobba Casini e rivela che il Pdl si presenterà alle elezioni con un nuovo nome. L'intervista di Berlusconi parte con un duro attacco al presidente della Camera. Al premier Berlusconi non sono piaciute le parole di Gianfranco Fini, secondo cui a questo punto la legislatura può continuare. Ospite di "Matrix', il Cavaliere rinfaccia a Fini la contraddizione tra l'auspicio che la legislatura arrivi alla sua scadenza naturale e l'aver presentato una mozione per provocare le dimissioni del governo: "A qualche giorno dal voto di una mozione di sfiducia al governo sono dichiarazioni che hanno dell'incredibile", osserva Berlusconi. Sul nodo delle elezioni anticipate, il presidente del Consiglio non esclude nulla. A chi gli chiede se le elezioni, dopo la frenata di Giorgio Napolitano, siano oggi più lontane, Berlusconi risponde : "Non è proprio così...". Al capo dello Stato, Berlusconi riconosce di essere una "persona di buon senso", e come tale di non volere un'accelerazione verso la crisi: "Tutte le persone di buonsenso, e quindi certamente il presidente Napolitano, non possono non augurarsi che ci sia una crisi in questo momento: e infatti è stata un'avventura sconsiderata e irresponsabile quella di chi ha privato il sostegno alla maggioranza". La strategia del Cavaliere per evitare il voto è legata alla possibilità di rafforzare con nuovi innesti la base parlamentare che sostiene il suo governo; ma se questo non fosse possibile "non ci sarebbe che da ritornare dal popolo sovrano", anche se le elezioni anticipate "non farebbero del bene al Paese": si aprirebbe infatti una campagna elettorale "combattiva" e il governo sarebbe inevitabilmente "meno capace di governaré. Che Berlusconi consideri le elezioni nel novero delle possibilità , lo si capisce anche dal suo annuncio sulla sostituzione del nome del pdl, mossa pensata per evitare che i finiani, ricorrendo alle vie legali, possano bloccare l'utilizzazione del simbolo : Sarà un nome "cortissimo, aggiunge,probabilmente "una parola sola". "Silvio?", gli chiede scherzando Alessio Vinci. "Magari...", replica sorridendo Berlusconi. Già che c'é il premier non si sottrae a una domanda sul suo successore: potrebbe essere una donna? "Perché no? Non escludo che anche in Italia ci possa essere un primo ministro donna", risponde Berlusconi, che però non sembra minimamente intenzionato a mollare: "Me ne andrò quando gli italiani me lo chiederanno" Sempre di sapore pre-elettorale la polemica contro la sinistra. Pierluigi Bersani viene liquidato come "schizofrenico" per essere "salito sui tetti" e poi aver "difeso i baroni". Berlusconi ironizza sui leader della sinistra, "tanti capetti che si fanno la guerra uno contro l'altro, e nessuno emerge", e stigmatizza le continue accuse che l'opposizione gli rovescia addosso: "L'antiberlusconismo - sostiene - è un insieme di odio, calunnie e invidia". Anche le manifestazioni contro la riforma dell'Università vengono liquidate da Berlusconi con la considerazione che esse sono piene di "pseudostudenti" e dunque non riflettono i convincimenti della maggioranza dei giovani italiani. Per ora, comunque, la preoccupazione prevalente è quella dell'allargamento della maggioranza. L'allargamento di cui parla Berlusconi, però, non sembra preludere a intese con il Terzo Polo. Se il giudizio riguardante Fini è duro, quello su Casini è più cortese ma improntato a un forte scetticismo sulle aperture dei centisti. Si fida di Casini? gli chiede il conduttore di Matrix: "In politica - risponde - è buona regola essere molto prudenti". "Personalmente - dice ancora Berlusconi di Casini - gli voglio bene. Con lui non ho mai avuto discussioni di cattivo gusto o volgari. Gli ho anche detto: 'nonostante tu sia cosi', ti voglio bené ". Tra i motivi che gli suggeriscono prudenza nel trattare con Casini, c'é il sospetto che il leader centrista possa rispondere alle sirene della sinistra: "Casini - sostiene il premier - ha pensato di poter svolgere un ruolo analogo a quello di Prodi, e quindi era propenso per un'alleanza con la sinistra. Ma un'alleanza di questo tipo lo penalizzerebbe di molto nei voti. Perderebbe il 70% dei suoi voti, secondo Euromedia". O allargo maggioranza o si va al voto - Le elezioni sono una ipotesi ancora in campo, perchè se non si riuscisse ad allargare la maggioranza, "l'unica strada sarebbe il voto anticipato". Ad Alessio Vinci che gli chiedeva se le elezioni ormai fossero impossibili, il premier ha risposto: "Non è proprio così. Riteniamo di poter allargare la maggioranza uscita dal voto di fiducia, ma ove non riuscissimo in questa nostra volontà e iniziativa, non ci sarebbe che da ritornare al popolo sovrano con elezioni anticipate che certamente non farebbero bene al Paese, con una campagna elettorale combattuta e un governo meno capace di governare, in un momento di crisi dal quale non siamo ancora usciti. Spero che potremo andare avanti per due anni e mezzo, ampliando numeri, altrimenti l'unica strada è il voto", ha concluso Berlusconi sul punto. Nessun nuovo arrivato avrà posti di governo - Nessuno di quelli che hanno votato la fiducia al governo cambiando schieramento avranno posti di governo, ha assicurato Berlusconi. "Io penso - ha detto - che non ci sarà questa eventualità". Lavoro: l'8,3% di disoccupati? E' un miglioramento - L'indice di disoccupazione all'8,3% "non è vero" che è il dato più alto degli ultimi anni, anzi "c'è stato un miglioramento", ha afferma ancora il premier spiegando che "c'è stata una prima agenzia che lasciava intendere questo", ovvero il dato peggiore, "ma poi altre agenzie hanno corretto".

description.hltext_display: [$] Detectives who led Leeson murder investigation feted
在理财中体验增值乐趣
description.content:
如何把银行里沉睡的存款，变成生财工具，是让“钱生钱”的关键。
2006年看到许多朋友都开始申请公积金贷款买房，我也去了几个售楼处咨询购房流程，打探按我每月的收入和所缴纳的公积金，到底能贷到多少购房款？经过了解得知，住房公积金贷款有国管与市管之分，我的学校属于市管，老公是个公务员，工作年限为15年，属于国管范畴，根据规定国管公积金的借款人，只要能够提供以家庭为单位的收入证明，在月收入不能少于对应贷款年限的情况下，最高可贷不超过40万元的房款。可见，在公积金的使用政策上，老公比我贷款多，而且有优势。
作为政策性住房的金融贷款，公积金以其低息、方便、贷款快，让我们心动有加，成为买房的首选。因为都有公积金，不会因贷款成为“房奴”，我们选择的是面积为106平方米的住房，可以贷款70%的房款，办理的是提前一次性结清贷款的类型。手续办好后，拿到钥匙就开始装修，并未感到按揭的压力。可以说，是公积金贷款圆了我多年的买房梦，也让我品味到购房置业的乐趣。
涉足股市10年，经历了数次印花税的调整，每次都让我感到如果不研究大盘，不研究政策走向，炒股就是拿着股本在博弈，输掉的只能是账户里的数字。2007年股指站在6000点以上，存款利率多次调高，房价狂升，这些都证明该是撤出股市转投基金和债券市场的时候了，于是我开始买基金。因为经常到银行存款和领取工资，我便对工行和中行新近推出的几款收益率在1.3%到2%的小型基金发生了浓厚兴趣，我买基金不喜欢太多的“承诺保本保收益”的宣传，任何基金公司都会在海外进行投资，既然是“投资”就是风险并存，金融危机下投资不当，必会影响到年收益率，而基金公司如果是投资于银行间债券市场，风险会相对降低，加上没有申购和赎回的费用，相当于是活期储蓄的升级版，适合中长期持有。
通过多年的基金投资，我感到只有进行稳健的操作，才会有好的收益。股市下跌，我没有忙着去补仓，等待时机抢反弹，而是给儿子准备起教育基金来，每月最低存入现金3000元到银行，年底时再存个定期，或转入购买新型理财式基金，我感到只有把闲置资金进行“再投资”，才能在别人银根缩紧时，让自己的投资有可观的回报，让理财成为一种增值的乐趣。
对于A股的操作，我在中报、年报出来前后，一般都会尽量清仓出局，这段时间是市场动荡期，手里没有股票反倒减少了“风险”。
操作题材上，我多以金融、新能源、汽车等概念股为关注点，不落的房价也许蕴藏着诸多的泡沫经济，地产股的持有要谨慎。黄金、油价和美元的汇率，直接影响到周边股市的波动。股市犹如过山车，股票涨得太快，不清洗下获利筹码，也不利于下一步的行情，即便出现调整性的跳水，也只能算是短暂趋势，长期还是向好。股票投资是需要经验累积和研究政策取向的，没有充裕的时间分析走势不行，而购买基金相对简单些，只要知道它的收益率和投资回报期限，可能比定期和活期存款，更适合像我这样的工薪族理财。

description.hltext_display: Man skjuten av polis
description.content: En man blev skjuten av polisen i Kåge norr om Skellefteå tidigt på onsdagsmorgonen. Enligt Västerbottens-Kuriren hade mannen låst in sig i sin bostad under natten och förhandlare fanns på plats. Tidigt på morgonen sprang han ut och rusade fram mot en patrull. Då öppnade polisen eld och träffade mannen i "nedre delarna av kroppen". Enligt polisen fördes mannen till sjukhus med skador som inte är livshotande. Händelsen ska nu utredas.

description.hltext_display: Toestel kost in Japan omgerekend 1089 euro
description.content:
TOKIO - Het Japanse elektronicaconcern Toshiba heeft woensdag in Japan de eerste driedimensionale televisie gelanceerd waarbij kijkers geen gebruik hoeven te maken van een speciaal brilletje. Dat heeft Toshiba woensdag bekendgemaakt.
De Japanse consument moet een bedrag van 119.800 yen (1089 euro) neertellen voor de nieuwe 3D-televisie. Kijkers hoeven daarbij geen gebruik te maken van een speciale bril die het mogelijk maakt om diepte te creren.

description.hltext_display: La Carreta presenta su versión de 'El gorrión y el poeta'
description.content:
El Palacio de los Condes de Gabia acoge a las 20 horas la puesta en escena de El gorrión y el poeta con la compañía La Carreta. La representación se enmarca en el marco del programa de actividades que el área de Cultura de la Diputación de Granada ha puesto en marcha para homenajear a Miguel Hernández en el primer centenario de su nacimiento, que se celebra en 2010.
Una de las particularidades de esta obra ideada por Francisco Guirado y Juan León es que se trata de un trabajo para público familiar, que ahonda en la vida y la obra de Miguel Hernández, un hombre sensible e idealista, un escritor de gran hondura poética: "Es una figura que nos conmueve y nos estimula, como ejemplo de compromiso valiente con la vida", dicen.La propuesta realizada por La Carreta parte de un relato inconcluso, El gorrión y el prisionero, en el que han convertido al propio poeta en el protagonista de una historia que habla, sobre todo, de la libertad, el único hábitat en el que puede sobrevivir un gorrión.
La obra se centra en la estancia del poeta en la cárcel de Alicante, final de su trayecto vital, para reconstruir su vida con sus propias palabras, recuerdos y vivencias, en una serie de estampas imaginarias. Para ponerlas en escena, han empleado diversas técnicas, incluyendo títeres, vídeo y creación plástica realizada en directo. El actor Roberto Martínez encarna la figura de Miguel Hernández y pone en escena una selección de poemas de diferentes etapas de su vida, que se intercalan con vivencias, recuerdos, cartas y anhelos, que nos acercan a Miguel, nos hablan de sus sentimientos, de sus temores, nos dibujan su entorno cercano y la realidad social del momento. Su realidad. El segundo frente tiene como objetivo dinamizar el espectáculo.

description.hltext_display: Choosing The Right Dining Room Tables Size
description.content: Picking the dining room tables which are the right size for your home doesn't ought to be difficult. Greater, with over hundreds of viable options available, needs to be one wouldn't be that simple either. However, if you're certain with your space and size requirements, it could be much simpler for you to narrow down your options. Of all the considerations you should make, the table size and the available dining room space are perhaps the key. You certainly wouldn't want to take home a newly purchased dining table, determine out that it won't fit in your dining area. Therefore, to avoid this, you will need to stringently sift through the available choices to avoid wasting your time, effort and money.It is crucial that you take precise measurements of the available dining room space and then list it down in a clean sheet of paper for easy reference. Acquiring the actual dining room dimension allows you to ensure that you will pick the table with the perfect size. Moreover, you have to to estimate the place settings that you need. You should definitely also record it combined with measurements of your dining area.To find the appropriate length of table that you'll require, you should multiply 24 inches on the quantity of place settings that you've recorded earlier. As for the table's width, the size of the room will be its determining factor. As a rule of thumb, the width of the table must be at around 36 inches but not more than 42 inches to ensure easy food placement.Do remember to maintain at least 36 inches distance from the edge of the table to the wall or existing furniture. This is extremely important to ascertain that there will be enough space to change position.After that, try to visualize the dining room setup that you need when you throw parties or special family dinners. Think the table could provide enough legroom for a comfortable seating or are you drinking able to accommodate more people than the usual? These questions will help you determine the appropriate table size to purchase. However, never forget to take into consideration your space requirements since everything will be put to waste if it can't fit the designated space anyway.You should definitely carefully evaluate all these important buying points to just remember to procure the dining room tables that will perfectly complement your existing space requirements.

description.hltext_display: Homes for Sale

Having a nice home would cost you more than your budget can be but they do assure you that you won't regret on buying the house to them.Owned houses that are on sale in the market that is owned by the original owner no company is attached is more cheaper they say, most of the buyers do choose this type of seller and houses they prefer it even there are advantages in which you can settle the account with the owner the amount you can afford and the owner can think about it. its disadvantage would be there would be a work to be done in the house for it maybe old or there are some parts of it needed to be renovated for t is cheaper yet you can afford on buying and renovating the house you have chosen.Homes on sale have many advantages as well as its disadvantages. Be very wise on picking the home you wanted to buy you can buy a well picked one yet it empties your wallet or choose with a cheaper one and needs renovation yet you can afford to renovate it. Have a lot of look and talk to the seller you might get a big off with it.

description.hltext_display: Jyväskylä on valkean joulun kaupunki
description.content:
Jyväskylässä on ollut suurista kaupungeista eniten valkeita jouluja viimeisen kahden vuosikymmenen aikana, kertoo Suomen ympäristökeskus. Vuosien 1990 ja 2009 välillä Jyväskylän jouluista on ollut valkeita 17, harmaita yksi ja mustia kaksi. Vähiten valkeita jouluja on ollut Turussa, jossa kahden viime vuosikymmenen aikana vain viisi joulua on ollut valkeita. Värinmääritykset perustuvat Suomen ympäristökeskuksen lumitietokantaan. Musta tarkoittaa lumetonta ja harmaa noin 1-10 millimetrin vesiarvoista lumipeitettä.
Tästä joulusta on tulossa valkea joka puolella Suomea, mutta kahden viime vuosikymmenen aikana monen suomalaisen joulut ovat olleet mustia tai harmaita.
Selvästi surkeimmat lumijoulut olivat 2006 ja 2007, jolloin lumiraja kulki Imatralta Oulun pohjoispuolelle. Tältä linjalta etelään oli vain metsissä valkeita rippeitä. Joulu oli tuolloin valkoinen vain noin miljoonan suomalaisen pihamaalla.
Koko maailmassa valkean joulun näkee keskimääräisenä vuotena noin 800 miljoonaa ihmistä. Yli puolet heistä ei vietä joulua. Kiinassa, Koreassa ja Japanissa joulua ei löydy kalenterista, ei myöskään eteläisen Aasian vuoristomaissa. Venäjällä puolestaan pakkasukko tulee vuodenvaihteen jälkeen.

description.hltext_display: Top job and family can't go hand-in-hand for women: Expert
description.content:
A sociologist at the London School Of Economics has claimed that women should forget about trying to work at a top job and manage their families well at the same time.
Dr Catherine Hakim said that women with high- powered careers rarely see their partner or kids and end up with only "nominal" families.
Her report has called for the Government to drop plans to give fathers more time off and cutting down flexible working hours for women or giving them more places for women on company boards.
Hakim said it is a "waste of time" fretting about that small difference and said any pay gap that might appear is due to women's lifestyle choices.
"In Britain, half of all women in senior positions are child-free and a lot more have nominal families with a single child. They sub-contract out the work of caring for them to other women," the Daily Star quoted Hakim as saying.
"Equal opportunities policies have succeeded in giving equal access for women to the labour market.
"People are confusing equal opportunities with equal outcomes, and there is little popular support for the kind of social engineering being demanded by feminists and legislators." (ANI)

event_or_fact.property: women with high- powered careers rarely see their partner or kids and end up with only "nominal" families.
They sub-contract out the work of caring for them to other women
it is a "waste of time" fretting about that small difference and said any pay gap that might appear is due to women's lifestyle choices.

description.hltext_display: Hundehalter reagiert aggressiv
description.content: Marßel (gke). Aggressiv wurde ein betrunkener Hundehalter nach einem Verkehrsunfall, den sein Hund verursacht hatte. Laut Polizei war der Mann mit einer Frau auf der Stockholmer Straße unterwegs, als sein Tier vor ein Auto sprang. Der Hund blieb unverletzt, der PKW wurde leicht beschädigt. Der Fahrer bat den Hundehalter um seine Personalien. Der wollte zuschlagen, stürzte aber wegen der Schneeglätte. Der Autofahrer alarmierte die Polizei, die das Paar kurz darauf in einem Bus aufspürte. Der schwergewichtige Hundehalter leistete Widerstand. Hilfskräfte waren notwendig, ihn zur Wache zu schaffen.

description.hltext_display: Coree, via alle manovre militari: navi in mare e mezzi vicino al confine
description.content: Torna a salire la tensione tra le due Coree. La Corea del Sud ha annunciato di aver dato inizio alla più massiccia esercitazione militare terrestre, con l'impiego di aerei e con l'uso di munizioni vere, a ridosso del confine con la Corea del Nord. Parallelamente Seul ha annunciato oggi l'inizio di manovre navali a un centinaio di km a sud del limite delle acque territoriali di Pyongyang. L'esercitazione terrestre, fa sapere l'esercito, durerà tre giorni e si svolge nella località di Pocheon, circa 20 km a sud della frontiera con il Nord. Saranno impiegati circa 800 soldati, elicotteri da combattimento, aerei da caccia, carri armati, cannoni autotrasportati, lanciamissili e razzi anticarro. Questa nuova ondata di manovre militari navali, aeree e terrestri segue di due giorni una breve esercitazione di artiglieria sudcoreana sull'isola di Yeonpyeong, che il 23 novembre fu cannoneggiata dai nordcoreani causando quattro morti. La Corea del Nord ha sparato 170 colpi di obice contro l'isola sudcoreana. Si è trattato del primo bombardamento in una zona civile dalla fine della guerra di Corea (1953), che ha provocato la morte di quattro sudcoreani. L'episodio ha portato le due Coree a un passo dalla guerra, come ha affermato ieri l'ambasciatore cinese presso le Nazioni Unite, Wang Min, nel corso di un dibattito organizzato dal Consiglio di Sicurezza dell'Onu con 150 alunni delle scuole di New York. Il Nord, alla cui attenzione è diretta questa nuova prova di forza, finora non ha espresso reazioni. Due giorni fa, in occasione dell'esercitazione di artiglieria, Pyongyang disse che "non vale la pena di reagire alle provocazioni", dopo aver minacciato nei giorni immediatamente precedenti "devastanti attacchi" nel caso l'esercitazione si fosse tenuta.

description.hltext_display: 文建會：多方考量 跨年晚會採邀請制 (中廣)
description.content:
迎接建國百年，12月31號晚間將在大佳河濱公園的花博園區舉行跨年晚會，還會有獨創的水幕煙火，不過這場活動卻採取邀請制，不開放民眾參觀，不少熱切期待的民眾感到錯愕。文建會主委盛治仁今天表示，採取「邀請制」是經過多方考量後的決定，而且邀請的是志工，還是一般民眾，不是所謂「權貴」（繆宇綸報導）
文建會主委盛治仁表示，跨年晚會現場大佳河濱公園約可容納8400人，主辦單位計畫透過各縣市政府，邀請6000位志工，還有1000多位弱勢團體的代表出席晚會，基本上能出席晚會的絕大多數人，還是一般民眾，所以這場跨年晚會絕對不是媒體報導所說的「權貴晚會」。至於採取邀請制，則是在多方考量後，認為這是整體成本最低，效果最好的辦法『我們曾經考慮過是不是找個時間，公開讓大家來索票，可是，公開索票我們猜想一定會有人提早一天在那邊排隊，而且來索票的大概都是住在台北的人會比較多，住在其他縣市的人要來參與的機會，可能就變得更少了......』
盛治仁說，有鑒於花博開幕的經驗，大佳河濱公園的出入交通不是很方便，花博開幕當天的疏散是很大的問題，那天幾乎沒辦法散場，車子幾乎出不去，所以才採取這樣的規劃，但是既然做了決定，就會接受公評，但絕對不是為所謂權貴或官方人士所規劃的活動。

description.hltext_display: Tremendously Clear Signs of Your Wife's Emotional Affair
description.content:
The worry of an emotional affair can be a very painful thing. The thought of your wife confiding in another man...the smile on her face when she gets a text from him, the worry that she might leave you entirely, the thought of her being intimate with him...you could find yourself depressed, unable to eat, unable to cope with anything.
Perhaps in your heart you know she is having an affair but you want to make absolutely sure, you want to prove it. Maybe you have asked her outright - and she says he is just a good friend, nothing more, she denies anything sexual. But still she refuses to let you look at the texts from him. Or look at her emails, or at her social network account.
You remember when she was a girl, when you were dating. There was nothing you wanted more than to hold her and make her laugh, to make her happy. You remember when you were married, and she looked so great! She knew that you were her man and she was so contented in that.
But now things have taken a definite downturn...so what are the signs that she is having an emotional affair?
The Signs
1. She walks around looking dreamily at her phone, waiting for his call or text.
2. She used to wear sweats and no make up, now she doesn't step out of the house unless she is all dressed up and looks HOT!
3. She is not interested in sex anymore. At all.
4. She is only vaguely interested in any family activities.
5. Before you could set your watch by her getting home from work, now she has to "work late", or even travel for work!
If your wife is showing these signs, then it extremely likely that she is having an emotional affair. Although she may think it is only friendship - well we know where that sort of friendship leads don't we?
Your Best Tactics
You are going to need some great psychological tactics to make her sit up and take notice of you. She needs to know that you are not prepared to be jerked around by her playing at being a girlfriend to someone else.
She must know that you are prepared to make effort to understand what her needs are, so make sure she is aware that you will do what you can to fulfill them. Otherwise, what will prevent her looking for someone else?

description.hltext_display: 理财产品年末爆棚
description.content:
在经历了10月份的短暂沉寂之后，银行理财产品市场在年底前开始爆发。根据银率网的数据，上月各商业银行共发行产品1019款，环比增幅达53%，同比增幅达45.8%。总体来看，发行量前15名的银行发行了936款产品，占比达91.9%。发行量排在前三名的银行依次为交通银行、中国银行和招商银行。
就到期产品收益率而言，相比10月份最高5.5%的实际收益率，11月份到期产品的表现明显更胜一筹。银率网数据显示，在763款上月到期产品中，共有720款披露了到期产品数据，其中716款产品达到了预期收益。具体来看，实际年化收益率前5名的产品均为结构性产品，其中渣打银行代客境外理财QD-SN10034I的实际收益率高达20%；恒生银行两款“步步稳”产品以及一款“天天开心”产品的实际收益率也超过了10%；而中信银行乐投1001期(A款)也实现了8%的实际收益率。
不过，投资者想要光靠理财产品来抵御通胀也不是一件容易的事。普益财富数据显示，11月份到期产品中，实际收益率超过5%及以上的产品仅有18款，占到期产品总量的2.5%左右。
从理财产品发行的趋势来看，在加息预期和年底揽存压力的共同作用下，银行理财产品的收益率也出现了一定程度的上浮。银率网数据显示，11月份发行的理财产品中，除了6个月至1年期产品预期收益率环比下跌0.57%之外，其余各期限产品预期收益率均环比上涨，其中1个月以内的人民币产品预期收益率环比上升0.05%；1至3个月产品环比上升0.22%；3至6个月产品环比上升0.19%；1年期以上的产品环比上升0.02%。银率网分析师认为，在央行加息前，预期收益率总体趋势将继续平稳运行，中期产品预期收益率将继续走低。
同时，理财产品的短期化趋势也愈发明显。银率网数据显示，11月份6个月以内的短期理财产品发行量为857款，环比上涨59%，占到发行总量的84.1%。而普益财富的数据显示，在最近几周时间里，3个月及以下期限的理财产品发行数量占总发行量的比例，一直维持在60%以上的高位，占据了发行主体地位。
业内人士表示，出于加息预期及流动性考虑，目前以选择短期理财产品为主，如果投资者想要追求更高收益率，可以关注结构性产品。但在购买之前一定要认清产品的挂钩标的，并弄懂产品的收益结构情况，审慎判断市场未来走势和自身风险承受能力，不可盲目购买。

description.hltext_display: Sevilla, Cádiz, Málaga y Granada, entre las ciudades más agraciadas
description.author: ABC
description.content: Sevilla y Cádiz son las ciudades andaluzas que más veces han sido favorecidas por el Sorteo Extraordinario de Navidad de la Lotería Nacional, ya que en ellas han recaído el 'Gordo' en 15 y 10 ocasiones en toda la historia del sorteo, según datos de Loterías y Apuestas del Estado consultados por Europa Press. Madrid es la ciudad más afortunada, con un total de 72 'Gordos', seguida de Barcelona, con 37; Sevilla, con 15; Valencia (11), Bilbao (11), Cádiz (10) y Zaragoza (10). También han recibido la suerte de forma múltiple Santander en ocho ocasiones, Málaga, Alicante y Granada, en siete, y San Sebastián, en seis, Palma de Mallorca y Gijón en cinco, La Coruña y Vich (Barcelona), en cuatro y Badajoz, Burgos, Lugo, Sort (Lérida) y Pamplona en tres. El 'Gordo' visitó en dos ocasiones Baeza (Jaén), Vitoria, Sabadell, Córdoba, Lérida, Alora (Málaga), Murcia, Palencia, Logroño, Segovia, Talavera de la Reina, Alcira y Manises (Valencia) y Valladolid. De las grandes ciudades, sólo ha pasado una vez por Almería, Castellón, Ciudad Real, Cuenca, Guadalajara, Huesca, León, Oviedo, Pontevedra, Vigo, Las Palmas y Teruel, además de en otras localidades de menor tamaño.

description.hltext_display: UConn Women Break UCLA's Win Record
description.content:
NEW YORK -- Men's teams. Women's teams. No. 89 belongs to UConn. It beats them all.
The No. 1-ranked Huskies women's basketball team topped the 88-game winning streak set by John Wooden's UCLA men's team from 1971-74, beating No. 22 Florida State 93-62 on Tuesday night. Playing with the relentlessness that has become its trademark - and would have made Wooden proud - Connecticut blew past the Seminoles as it has so many other teams in the last 2 years."I don't want my team to compare themselves to anyone," UConn coach Geno Auriemma said afterward. "I'm not John Wooden and this isn't UCLA. This is Connecticut and that's good enough."
Maya Moore had a career-high 41 points and 10 rebounds and freshman Bria Hartley added 21 points for the Huskies, who have not lost since April 6, 2008, in the NCAA tournament semifinals. Only twice during the record run has a team come within single digits of UConn - Stanford in the NCAA championship game last season and Baylor in early November.
When the final buzzer sounded, UConn players sprinted across the floor to shake hands with the student section as fans held up "89" signs and "89" balloons bobbed in the stands behind center court. Two other fans raised a banner that read "The Sorcerer of Storrs" - a play on Wooden's nickname, "The Wizard of Westwood."
After a brief huddle in front of their bench, UConn players re-emerged wearing "89 and Counting" T-shirts. As fans roared, the players bounced around the court before posing for photos.
It's one more chapter of history for UConn, and perhaps the grandest.
"It's pretty amazing. It really is," said Auriemma, at a rare loss for words.
Asked what he would recall from the incredible run, he mentioned a pair of experienced stars on this team: "I'll probably remember Maya Moore and Tiffany Hayes. And how incredibly difficult it is to play that many games in a row and win 'em all."
Connecticut long ago established itself as the marquee program in the women's game, the benchmark by which all others are measured. The Huskies already own seven national titles and four perfect seasons under Auriemma, and they've produced a galaxy of stars that includes Rebecca Lobo, Diana Taurasi, Jennifer Rizzotti, Sue Bird and Tina Charles.
The streak, though, takes it to another level, certainly raising the profile of women's basketball and maybe all of women's athletics.
Two days after beating No. 11 Ohio State to tie UCLA, UConn toppled the mark in front of a sellout crowd of 16,294 at the XL Center that included Wooden's grandson, Greg, attending his first women's game.
"My grandfather would have been thrilled. He would have been absolutely thrilled to see his streak broken by a women's basketball team," the 47-year-old Wooden said. "He thought, especially in the last 10 years, that the best basketball was played at the collegiate level - and it wasn't by the men."
John Wooden was 99 when he died last June 4.
There was a festive atmosphere throughout the city, where building lights gleamed blue and white, and it was as electric as any Final Four inside the arena. Charles and UConn men's star Kemba Walker sat behind the Huskies' bench, and football coach Randy Edsall was there, too. Former NFL star Warrick Dunn, meanwhile, was cheering for his alma mater, Florida State.
With the game tied at 6, Moore and UConn (11-0) took command. The senior All-American had seven points during a 15-2 run to give Connecticut its first double-digit lead, and Moore's fadeaway jumper from the baseline extended the advantage to 34-15. Florida State (9-3) made a quick run to cut the lead to 11, but the Huskies weren't about to let anyone spoil this night.
UConn ripped off the next 16 points, capped by consecutive 3-pointers from Hartley and a pull-up by Moore. Auriemma gave Hartley a kiss at the next timeout, and the tough-to-please coach was still grinning at halftime.
"She doesn't feel any of this," Auriemma said as he left the court. "She's kind of immune to all of this as a freshman. I love kids like that."
With a minute left to play and victory assured, Moore stood up and whirled a towel around her head. The All-American tossed it in the air briefly before sitting down for the final seconds, beaming as she and her teammates on the bench yelled encouragement at the players on the floor.
"All you guys from Florida State, it wasn't easy to be part of all of this," Auriemma said. "I hope you don't feel disrespected by all this. You played a heck of a game."
UConn's rise to prominence began in 1995, when Lobo led the Huskies to their first national championship and unbeaten season. Since then, the best players in the country have made their way to the rural campus in Storrs, 30 miles outside of Hartford.
The excellence and confidence that defines great teams defines this one because Auriemma won't have it any other way. Perfection is expected, not simply a goal, and Auriemma goes to extraordinary lengths to get it.
He goads his players with criticisms of their games - sarcastic remarks that may strike outsiders as harsh but somehow trigger just the right response with gusto. He makes them play games of seven-on-five in practice. He rounds up bigger, stronger male students around campus to serve as practice players. He runs endless drills to hone skills the players thought they had mastered in junior high.
It hardly seems to matter who is on the floor because UConn players don't wear names on the back of their uniforms. The only one that counts is the one on the front.
When UConn - led by Taurasi - won 70 straight games from 2001-03, a record in the women's game, it seemed unfathomable that it would be toppled, like UCLA's 88. But what fans have learned over the years is that nothing this team does should be surprising. The Huskies have beaten 16 top-10 teams during the latest streak - four more than UCLA did during its run - and five of those wins came against the No. 2 team. It's been more than 17 years since UConn lost consecutive games.
"We never talked about the streak," said Charles, last season's national player of the year. "We were playing for each other, what we did at practice, all the hard work we did, and just trying to do it on the court. There wasn't anything about the streak."
The Huskies have won by any average of more than 33 points during the streak and rarely found themselves in trouble. They have trailed for 134 minutes, including only 13 in the second half. They've won back-to-back national championships, and are now one short of Tennessee's record for overall titles by a women's team.
Even before UConn tied UCLA's record, the two programs were linked.
Auriemma acknowledges that his team runs the same offense that Wooden perfected 37 years earlier. But it's not just the Xs and Os. The top block of Wooden's pyramid of success reads: "Competitive Greatness: Perform at your best when your best is required. Your best is required every day."
That's been Auriemma's mantra.
Greg Wooden, who lives in California, said he came East because, "I kind of thought that somebody should come here from the family and show support."
He also was aware that "certain players have said they're not really supportive of the streak."
But he came knowing "my grandfather would have loved to have been here to see this."
The day Notre Dame broke UCLA's streak, John Wooden was asked how long it would be before somebody surpassed it.
"I have no idea how long it will be before somebody else wins that many. I know it takes at least three years," he replied.
Try 36 years, 11 months, and 2 days.
